questions.question: What is the primary constellation used for celestial navigation in the Southern Hemisphere?
Which of the following is NOT a topic covered in the Navigation and Wayfinding unit?
What is the angular difference between magnetic north and true north called?
Which of the following is a natural indicator that can be used for navigation?
What type of map shows natural and man-made features as well as elevation changes?
What are the lines on a topographic map that connect points of equal elevation called?
Which activity is included in the Navigation and Wayfinding unit to practice skills?
What is the direction from one point to another, usually expressed in degrees, called?
Which of the following is NOT a limitation of celestial navigation?
What simple tool can be created to determine direction using the sun's position?
Which of the following is a key objective of the Navigation and Wayfinding unit?
What is the process of orienting oneself and the map to the surrounding terrain called?
Which of the following is NOT typically found on a topographic map?
What is the primary purpose of an orienteering exercise?
choices: To practice map and compass skills
To study local flora and fauna
questions.answer: To practice map and compass skills

questions.question: Which natural feature can often indicate the direction of prevailing winds in an area?

What is the primary function of a compass in navigation?
Which celestial body is most commonly used for daytime navigation?
What is the term for the imaginary lines that run north-south on a map or globe?
Which of the following is NOT a method taught for finding direction without a compass?
What is the primary advantage of using natural navigation techniques?
choices: They are more accurate than modern methods
They work in all weather conditions
They are faster than using a map and compass

questions.question: Which of the following is a key skill practiced in the orienteering exercise?

What is the primary challenge of using celestial navigation in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT a component of the homework assignment for this unit?
choices: Creating a detailed map from home to school

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of the natural indicators scavenger hunt activity?
choices: To find examples of natural direction indicators
questions.answer: To find examples of natural direction indicators
